name: Town Blast - Pet Matching Game
description:
Don't stress out, play Town Blast and relieve your stress & relax!

Welcome to the Town Blast - unique match 3 puzzle game, rescue pets by matching them (watch the blast graphics dazzle as you match the pets) and unlocking all towns and levels! Let the saga begin as you start on level 1.

Move through each huge town and open new levels with fun animal & pet characters, it's quite a saga to witness as you match all the cubes and use super fun boosters. Rescue pets with cool blasts as they are chained up in many levels, they need your help to be free!

Swipe and move them in any direction (isn't it annoying that some other matching games won't let you?), combine them to pass levels fast. No restrictions on which directions you can move your animal or pet characters. It's quite liberating compared to other match 3 games, and helps relieve stress!

Cool boosters help you crush anytime to finish levels faster and collect more coins and stars. We've heard from people who love this game due to it's fun, unique puzzles. Town Blast is also a great stress reliever & helps you relax after a long day at work or school!

1400+ unique levels give you endless hours of pleasure and fun. Great sense of accomplishment as you move to each new town (level)! Install Town Blast now and let the saga of rescuing pets start!

Town Blast features:
- FREE to play, very limited ads
- 1400+ levels
- Swipe and move game characters in any direction
-Great stress relief and relaxing as you play
- 13 cool boosters to help rescue pets & animals
- Connect and play with friends on Facebook
-Automatically generate free new lives (even if app is closed)
- NO annoying pop-up ads
- NO Internet Connection Required to Play
-Great bundle offers for lives, coins & boosters so you don't get stuck on 1 level forever

The colorful pets you will rescue and set to freedom in a saga format are: turtles, birds, bears, cats and other animals that need your help. Will you help blast them to freedom with your matching skills? Get started with your boosters and cube blasts right now!
